metadata.name: Safari
metadata.description:
Introducing the stunning Dior-inspired dress of the season! This vibrant green beauty is crafted from the highest-quality neoprene scuba tulip, giving it a structured, yet elegant silhouette that hugs your curves in all the right places. Inspired by Dior's 1959 aesthetic, the flowing skirt exudes the same timeless elegance that has made Dior a fashion icon for decades.

But that's just the beginning – this dress comes complete with a bubble jacket that not only adds a touch of modern sophistication but also mimics the lush beauty of the jungle, with elephants as its iconic symbol. It's a true work of art, fusing classic and contemporary elements to create a truly unique look that is both breathtaking and memorable.

And it's not just about looking good – this dress is also about making a difference. It embodies the desire to work towards a more sustainable and nature-connected fashion industry, something that is at the forefront of today's fashion landscape. With the help of the digital fashion revolution, this dress represents the future of fashion – one that is not only stylish but also environmentally conscious.

So, step into the world of high fashion with this breathtaking Dior-inspired dress, and join the movement towards a brighter, greener future. With its unique design and meaningful message, you'll turn heads and inspire others to follow in your footsteps. Be bold, be beautiful, be eco-conscious – be everything this dress represents.

Base Fabric: Neoprene Scuba

We express our gratitude the music producer @royalcitylif for granting us permission to utilize his music.

Bonus:

Digital  
4K rendered animation  
4K rendered stills  
Custom digital recreation of the dress in 1 open metaverse of choice. Redemption window: 2 years

Physical  
Physical version of The  SAFARI custom-fitted to the wearer (must visit Lusi Machicao atelier in Charlotte NC or Select one standard Size with measures via mail). Redemption window: 1 year  
Original signed sketch of The SAFARI personally drawn and signed by Luis Machicao.

Experiential  
1 -year access to Luis Machicao couture events.  
Private interview with Luis Machicao.  
2-week exhibition of The Name of dress with collector’s name in an important gallery or museum in the United States.  
2-week exhibition of The  Name of Dress anywhere in the world with collector’s name (to be coordinated with Agalma and Luis Machicao)
